title: On Internally Strong Świa̧tkowski Functions

items.abstract:
<jats:title>Abstract</jats:title>
				<jats:p> In this paper we characterize the product of internally quasi- -continuous functions and we construct a bounded internally quasi-continuous strong Świa̧tkowski function which cannot be written as a finite product of internally strong Świa̧tkowski functions.</jats:p>
